AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

MultiFeature.Name: Legacy of Minauros
MultiFeature.Text: You know the mage hand cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the Tenser’s floating disk spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the arcane lock spell once with this trait, requiring no material component, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

SubRace.Name: Mammon Tiefling
SubRace.Description: The great miser Mammon loves coins above all else. Tieflings tied to him excel at gathering and safeguarding wealth.
